root.action: Equipment Toggles the display of the equipment screen (not yet implemented).
PostProcessing Toggles the display of the post-processing window.
VOIPWindow Toggles the display of the VOIP window (not yet implemented).
ChatWindow Toggles the display of the chat window.
ChatFlashWindow Toggles the display of the chat flash window.
Inventory Toggles the display of the player's inventory window.
Environment Toggles the display of the environment window.
Help Toggles the display of the help window.
ClientServerStats Toggles the display of the network statistics window.
JobSystem Toggles the display of the job system CPU utilisation window.
ToggleUmbra Enables/disables Umbra.
HideGUI Hides all GUI elements.
TogglePythonConsole Toggles the display of the Python debugging console.
ToggleWatcherConsole Toggles the display of the watcher debugging console.
ToggleStatsConsole Toggles the display of the client performance statistics console.
ToggleTerrainWireframe Toggles wireframe rendering for terrain.
ToggleObjectWireframe Toggles wireframe rendering for objects.
ToggleHistogram Toggles display of colour histogram.
CellBoundaryVisualisation Toggles cell boundary visualisation.
ToggleFlyThroughMode Toggles fly-through mode.
EscapeKey Cancels current action and displays in-game menu.
Web Toggles the display of the web browser.
